utterances: (As Santa's secretary) Oh, good news.
I see an opening on Santa's calendar in July.
(As Spark) July?
(As Santa's secretary) How does 5 am work for you, Spark?
(As Spark) It does not work for me.
You know how many months away that is?
(As Santa's secretary) If you want to get in here any earlier you're going to have to sit on Santa's lap.
(As Spark) Huh?
(As Santa's secretary) Just kidding.
(As Spark) Huh.
(As mall crew leader) Mall crew on sleigh 6.
I need all of my mall elves on the sleigh now.
Whoa, whoa, whoa.
What are you doing?
(As Spark) I'm just getting onto sleigh 6.
I'm on the mall crew.
(As mall crew leader) You're not on my mall crew.
(As Spark) Right.
I'm just a - I'm a trainee.
(As mall crew leader) There are no trainees on the mall crew.
(As Spark) They might just not have gotten the paperwork down to you, but...
(As mall crew leader) Listen, you think this is a game, huh?
(As Spark) No.
(As mall crew leader) You ever been to a mall with kids who are drinking hot cocoa, eating candy, and they're about to meet the most important man in the world?
(As Spark) Well, not in person, but I...
(As mall crew leader) Then you have no idea what you are in for.
(As Spark) Listen.
I've got a candy cane I don't need.
And it can be your candy cane if I just get on that sleigh.
(As mall crew leader) Got any chocolate?
(SLEIGH BELLS)
(As mall crew leader) Mall express.
Sleigh number 6 to the mall.
We're going to the mall, elves.
(MUSIC)
(As girl in department store) Mommy, there's an elf in front of us.
(As mom in department store) Hmm?
(As girl in department store) There's an elf.
(As mom in department store) I know.
Are you excited to see Santa and tell him everything you want?
(As mom in department store) Shh.
Katie, that's not very nice.
(As girl in department store) He has big ears.
(As mom in department store) That's very naughty.
(As Spark) Zip it, kid.
(As girl in department store) Where's your parents?
Where's your parents?
(As Spark) I'm an orphan, OK?
Are you happy now?
(As mom in department store) Katie, you say you're sorry.
(As girl in department store) Sorry.
(As Santa) Where's the next one?
(As Daisy) Next child.
(As Spark) Yeah.
That's me.
(As Daisy) Spark?
Is that you?
Spark Elgooso?
What are you doing dressed like that?
(As Spark) Please just let me through.
(As Daisy) Spark, you should be back at the North Pole.
They need you.
(As Spark) I know.
I wouldn't be here if it weren't important.
Please just tell him it's a little boy.
(As Daisy) Absolutely not, Spark.
I cannot do that.
I mean, this is Santa Claus.
This is my job.
(As Santa) Santa's got an empty lap here.
(As Daisy) I have to keep this line moving.
(As Spark) Daisy, this is bigger than both of us, OK?
(As Daisy) Santa.
This is an elf.
He's not supposed to be here, and he is leaving now.
(As Santa) Oh, no, no, no. We've got an empty Santa lap here.
Come on.
